7// Surface.h: Defines the egl::Surface class, representing a drawing surface
8// such as the client area of a window, including any back buffers.
9// Implements EGLSurface and related functionality. [EGL 1.4] section 2.2 page 3.
10
11#ifndef LIBANGLE_SURFACE_H_
12#define LIBANGLE_SURFACE_H_
13
14#include <EGL/egl.h>
15
16#include "common/PackedEnums.h"
17#include "common/angleutils.h"
18#include "libANGLE/AttributeMap.h"
19#include "libANGLE/Debug.h"
20#include "libANGLE/Error.h"
21#include "libANGLE/FramebufferAttachment.h"
22#include "libANGLE/RefCountObject.h"
23#include "libANGLE/formatutils.h"
24#include "libANGLE/renderer/SurfaceImpl.h"
25
26namespace gl
27{
28class Context;
29class Framebuffer;
30class Texture;
31} // namespace gl
32
33namespace rx
34{
35class EGLImplFactory;
36}
37
38namespace egl
39{
40class Display;
41struct Config;
42
43using SupportedCompositorTiming = angle::PackedEnumBitSet<CompositorTiming>;
44using SupportedTimestamps = angle::PackedEnumBitSet<Timestamp>;
45
46struct SurfaceState final : private angle::NonCopyable
47{
48 SurfaceState(const egl::Config *configIn, const AttributeMap &attributesIn);
49 ~SurfaceState();
50
51 bool isRobustResourceInitEnabled() const;
52
53 EGLLabelKHR label;
54 const egl::Config *config;
55 AttributeMap attributes;
56
57 bool timestampsEnabled;
58 SupportedCompositorTiming supportedCompositorTimings;
59 SupportedTimestamps supportedTimestamps;
60 bool directComposition;
61};
62
63class Surface : public LabeledObject, public gl::FramebufferAttachmentObject
64{
65 public:
66 rx::SurfaceImpl *getImplementation() const { return mImplementation; }
67
68 void setLabel(EGLLabelKHR label) override;
69 EGLLabelKHR getLabel() const override;
70
71 EGLint getType() const;
72
73 Error initialize(const Display *display);
74 Error makeCurrent(const gl::Context *context);
75 Error unMakeCurrent(const gl::Context *context);
76 Error swap(const gl::Context *context);
77 Error swapWithDamage(const gl::Context *context, EGLint *rects, EGLint n_rects);
78 Error swapWithFrameToken(const gl::Context *context, EGLFrameTokenANGLE frameToken);
79 Error postSubBuffer(const gl::Context *context,
80 EGLint x,
81 EGLint y,
82 EGLint width,
83 EGLint height);
84 Error setPresentationTime(EGLnsecsANDROID time);
85 Error querySurfacePointerANGLE(EGLint attribute, void **value);
86 Error bindTexImage(gl::Context *context, gl::Texture *texture, EGLint buffer);
87 Error releaseTexImage(const gl::Context *context, EGLint buffer);
88
89 Error getSyncValues(EGLuint64KHR *ust, EGLuint64KHR *msc, EGLuint64KHR *sbc);
90 Error getMscRate(EGLint *numerator, EGLint *denominator);
91
92 EGLint isPostSubBufferSupported() const;
93
94 void setSwapInterval(EGLint interval);
95 Error onDestroy(const Display *display);
96
97 void setMipmapLevel(EGLint level);
98 void setMultisampleResolve(EGLenum resolve);
99 void setSwapBehavior(EGLenum behavior);
100
101 void setFixedWidth(EGLint width);
102 void setFixedHeight(EGLint height);
103
104 gl::Framebuffer *createDefaultFramebuffer(const gl::Context *context,
105 egl::Surface *readSurface);
106
107 const Config *getConfig() const;
108
109 // width and height can change with client window resizing
110 EGLint getWidth() const;
111 EGLint getHeight() const;
112 // Note: windows cannot be resized on Android. The approach requires
113 // calling vkGetPhysicalDeviceSurfaceCapabilitiesKHR. However, that is
114 // expensive; and there are troublesome timing issues for other parts of
115 // ANGLE (which cause test failures and crashes). Therefore, a
116 // special-Android-only path is created just for the querying of EGL_WIDTH
117 // and EGL_HEIGHT.
118 // https://issuetracker.google.com/issues/153329980
119 egl::Error getUserWidth(const egl::Display *display, EGLint *value) const;
120 egl::Error getUserHeight(const egl::Display *display, EGLint *value) const;
121 EGLint getPixelAspectRatio() const;
122 EGLenum getRenderBuffer() const;
123 EGLenum getSwapBehavior() const;
124 TextureFormat getTextureFormat() const;
125 EGLenum getTextureTarget() const;
126 bool getLargestPbuffer() const;
127 EGLenum getGLColorspace() const;
128 EGLenum getVGAlphaFormat() const;
129 EGLenum getVGColorspace() const;
130 bool getMipmapTexture() const;
131 EGLint getMipmapLevel() const;
132 EGLint getHorizontalResolution() const;
133 EGLint getVerticalResolution() const;
134 EGLenum getMultisampleResolve() const;
135
136 gl::Texture *getBoundTexture() const { return mTexture; }
137
138 EGLint isFixedSize() const;
139
140 // FramebufferAttachmentObject implementation
141 gl::Extents getAttachmentSize(const gl::ImageIndex &imageIndex) const override;
142 gl::Format getAttachmentFormat(GLenum binding, const gl::ImageIndex &imageIndex) const override;
143 GLsizei getAttachmentSamples(const gl::ImageIndex &imageIndex) const override;
144 bool isRenderable(const gl::Context *context,
145 GLenum binding,
146 const gl::ImageIndex &imageIndex) const override;
147
148 void onAttach(const gl::Context *context, rx::Serial framebufferSerial) override {}
149 void onDetach(const gl::Context *context, rx::Serial framebufferSerial) override {}
150 GLuint getId() const override;
151
152 bool flexibleSurfaceCompatibilityRequested() const
153 {
154 return mFlexibleSurfaceCompatibilityRequested;
155 }
156 EGLint getOrientation() const { return mOrientation; }
157
158 bool directComposition() const { return mState.directComposition; }
159
160 gl::InitState initState(const gl::ImageIndex &imageIndex) const override;
161 void setInitState(const gl::ImageIndex &imageIndex, gl::InitState initState) override;
162
163 bool isRobustResourceInitEnabled() const { return mRobustResourceInitialization; }
164
165 const gl::Format &getBindTexImageFormat() const { return mColorFormat; }
166
167 // EGL_ANDROID_get_frame_timestamps entry points
168 void setTimestampsEnabled(bool enabled);
169 bool isTimestampsEnabled() const;
170
171 const SupportedCompositorTiming &getSupportedCompositorTimings() const;
172 Error getCompositorTiming(EGLint numTimestamps,
173 const EGLint *names,
174 EGLnsecsANDROID *values) const;
175
176 Error getNextFrameId(EGLuint64KHR *frameId) const;
177 const SupportedTimestamps &getSupportedTimestamps() const;
178 Error getFrameTimestamps(EGLuint64KHR frameId,
179 EGLint numTimestamps,
180 const EGLint *timestamps,
181 EGLnsecsANDROID *values) const;
182
183 // Returns the offset into the texture backing the surface if specified via texture offset
184 // attributes (see EGL_ANGLE_d3d_texture_client_buffer extension). Returns zero offset
185 // otherwise.
186 const gl::Offset &getTextureOffset() const { return mTextureOffset; }
187
188 protected:
189 Surface(EGLint surfaceType,
190 const egl::Config *config,
191 const AttributeMap &attributes,
192 EGLenum buftype = EGL_NONE);
193 ~Surface() override;
194 rx::FramebufferAttachmentObjectImpl *getAttachmentImpl() const override;
195
196 gl::Framebuffer *createDefaultFramebuffer(const Display *display);
197
198 // ANGLE-only method, used internally
199 friend class gl::Texture;
200 Error releaseTexImageFromTexture(const gl::Context *context);
201
202 SurfaceState mState;
203 rx::SurfaceImpl *mImplementation;
204 int mRefCount;
205 bool mDestroyed;
206
207 EGLint mType;
208 EGLenum mBuftype;
209
210 bool mPostSubBufferRequested;
211 bool mFlexibleSurfaceCompatibilityRequested;
212
213 bool mLargestPbuffer;
214 EGLenum mGLColorspace;
215 EGLenum mVGAlphaFormat;
216 EGLenum mVGColorspace;
217 bool mMipmapTexture;
218 EGLint mMipmapLevel;
219 EGLint mHorizontalResolution;
220 EGLint mVerticalResolution;
221 EGLenum mMultisampleResolve;
222
223 bool mFixedSize;
224 size_t mFixedWidth;
225 size_t mFixedHeight;
226
227 bool mRobustResourceInitialization;
228
229 TextureFormat mTextureFormat;
230 EGLenum mTextureTarget;
231
232 EGLint mPixelAspectRatio; // Display aspect ratio
233 EGLenum mRenderBuffer; // Render buffer
234 EGLenum mSwapBehavior; // Buffer swap behavior
235
236 EGLint mOrientation;
237
238 // We don't use a binding pointer here. We don't ever want to own an orphaned texture. If a
239 // Texture is deleted the Surface is unbound in onDestroy.
240 gl::Texture *mTexture;
241
242 gl::Format mColorFormat;
243 gl::Format mDSFormat;
244
245 gl::Offset mTextureOffset;
246
247 private:
248 Error destroyImpl(const Display *display);
249
250 void postSwap(const gl::Context *context);
251 Error releaseRef(const Display *display);
252
253 // ObserverInterface implementation.
254 void onSubjectStateChange(angle::SubjectIndex index, angle::SubjectMessage message) override;
255
256 gl::InitState mInitState;
257 angle::ObserverBinding mImplObserverBinding;
258};
259
260class WindowSurface final : public Surface
261{
262 public:
263 WindowSurface(rx::EGLImplFactory *implFactory,
264 const Config *config,
265 EGLNativeWindowType window,
266 const AttributeMap &attribs);
267 ~WindowSurface() override;
268};
269
270class PbufferSurface final : public Surface
271{
272 public:
273 PbufferSurface(rx::EGLImplFactory *implFactory,
274 const Config *config,
275 const AttributeMap &attribs);
276 PbufferSurface(rx::EGLImplFactory *implFactory,
277 const Config *config,
278 EGLenum buftype,
279 EGLClientBuffer clientBuffer,
280 const AttributeMap &attribs);
281
282 protected:
283 ~PbufferSurface() override;
284};
285
286class PixmapSurface final : public Surface
287{
288 public:
289 PixmapSurface(rx::EGLImplFactory *implFactory,
290 const Config *config,
291 NativePixmapType nativePixmap,
292 const AttributeMap &attribs);
293
294 protected:
295 ~PixmapSurface() override;
296};
297
298class SurfaceDeleter final
299{
300 public:
301 SurfaceDeleter(const Display *display);
302 ~SurfaceDeleter();
303 void operator()(Surface *surface);
304
305 private:
306 const Display *mDisplay;
307};
308
309using SurfacePointer = angle::UniqueObjectPointerBase<Surface, SurfaceDeleter>;
310
311} // namespace egl
312
313#endif // LIBANGLE_SURFACE_H_
